title: Regulation (EEC) No 1833/73 of the Commission of 5 July 1973 supplementing the lists of apple varieties annexed to the quality standards for dessert apples and pears
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1833/73 OF THE COMMISSION  of 5 July 1973  supplementing the lists of apple varieties annexed to the quality standards for dessert apples and pears
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the quality standards for apples and pears set out in the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 1641/71 the variety "Karmijn de Sonnaville" is added:    - after the variety Worcester Pearmain in Table A, Group B,
- after the variety Dunn's Seedling in Table B,
- after the variety Melrose in Table C, List 1.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 July 1973.
For the Commission
The President
Franรงois-Xavier ORTOLI  (1)OJ No L 118, 20.5.1972, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 291, 28.12.1972, p. 147. (3)OJ No L 172, 31.7.1971, p. 1.
